Detailed Description

Contain all functions to create XMPP messages.

CHESSD - WebClient

This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

C3SL - Center for Scientific Computing and Free Software

Create all messages used both Jabber and Chess Server (see Chess server XMPP protocol)

function MESSAGE_Challenge (   ChallengeID,
  Category,
  Rated,
  Players,
  MatchID 
)

Create message to send a challenge message.

Should be extended to support Bughouse with more two players. The Player's structure has the following fields:

  • Name
  • Color
  • Inc
  • Time The 'Color' field must contain just the first letter of color

Parameters:
ChallengeID Challenge identification number (integer)
Category Game cateory
Rated Game rated flag
Players List of Players Object(with username, color, increment, time)
MatchID Match identification number (integer)
Returns:
XMPP message
Author:
Rubens Suguimoto

References MainData.

Referenced by CHALLENGE_SendChallenge(), and CHALLENGE_SendReChallenge().

function MESSAGE_GameRequests (   Action,
  GameID 
)

Create the game action requests messages to opponent.

Action can be "Draw", "Cancel", "Adjourn" and "Resign".

Parameters:
Action String with action to do when playing some game
GameID Game room name Identification
Returns:
XMPP message
Author:
Rubens Suguimoto

function MESSAGE_GameResponse (   Action,
  GameID,
  Response 
)

Create the game actions response messages.

Action can be "Draw", "Cancel" and "Adjourn".

Parameters:
Action String with action to do when playing some game
GameID Game room name Identification
Response Create a response with accept ou decline ("" = accept or "-decline" = decline)
Returns:
XMPP message
Author:
Rubens Suguimoto

function MESSAGE_GetOldGames (   Id,
  Jid1,
  Jid2,
  NumGames,
  Offset,
  Color,
  To,
  From 
)

Create a message to get old games list with some filters.

Parameters:
Id Oldgame window Id (Quick fix)
Jid1 First player username
Jid2 Second player username
NumGames Number of games to be search
Offset List off set of old games
Color First player color (if not defined, search for all colors)
From Date begin interval (if not defined, is considerate infinit)
To Date end interval (if not defined, is considerate infinit)
Returns:
XMPP message
Author:
Rubens Suguimoto and Danilo Yorinori

References MainData.

Referenced by INTERFACE_SetNextButton(), INTERFACE_SetPrevButton(), INTERFACE_SetSearchButton(), and OLDGAME_OpenOldGameWindow().

function MESSAGE_Presence (   To  ) 

Create a message with Jabber presence.

function MESSAGE_Wait (  ) 

Create a wait message.

This message is used to make a pesistent conection to BOSH. In certain interval of time, this message is send to notificate BOSH that client is still connected.

Returns:
Empty string
Author:
Pedro Rocha

Referenced by CONNECTION_ReceiveConnection(), and CONNECTION_ReceiveXml().
